about_the_game:
Who is Cold Lazarus, and what mysteries awaken with them?

Lazarus wakes up amidst the fragmented asteroid islands of Nimbranumbra. With no memory of identity or mission, Lazarus becomes intricately entwined in the chaos and politics that rule over the endearing inhabitants of this forgotten world.



Cold Lazarus unfolds as a hand-drawn, cartoon fantasy epic—a 2D side-scrolling adventure that spans ancient ruins, forgotten forests, quaint mushroom villages and alternate dimensions. Fire your laser powers at dangerous enemies! Bombard your foes with exploding Easter eggs! Foil the assaults of minions with imaginative items, like a giant fighting teddy bear!

Game Features:

  • Epic side-scrolling action, platforming and puzzles.
  • Smooth 2D controls. Forget the double jump—how about a quintuple jump! Flip, flap and flutter your way around deadly enemy attacks. Dejectedly, Lazarus the bird forgot how to fly…
  • Lock on to your foes with a simple targeting system and unleash Lazarus’s strange bird laser powers! Woah!
  • Barrage your enemies with exploding grenades supplied by the Easter bunny!
  • Utilize crazy items to aid in your battles! Need some backup? Summon a giant fighting Teddy Bear! Too many enemies at once? Stop all enemy movement with the Cuckoo-Clock! Want to wipe the board? Perhaps a plague of locust or frogs could help?
  • Collect ingredients for the "averse to labor" ocelot, so that you can watch television with him and regain some of your forgotten powers. I.e. There’s a simple but powerful upgrade system!
  • Follow the main story quest as Lazarus meticulously chronicles the details in elaborate and often humorous diary entries. Immerse yourself in a rich narrative of intrigue, romance, power, and vengeance!
  • Embark on numerous side quests, each offering valuable rewards to enhance Lazarus's journey. Explore a variety of storylines, each featuring its own charming characters and captivating narratives.
  • Dozens of unique boss fights, characters, enemies and landscapes!
  • A beautiful, epic symphonic rock soundtrack, which embellishes the mysterious and momentous world and story. Composed by Sheldon Slater, featuring Andy Burns and Danny San Filippo.

An Odyssey Awaits...

When Lazarus awoke to the wondrous healing powers of a local guru, the spiritual guide mouse Mungus, he did not remember who he was, where he was going, or where he had been. Mungus, the accommodating vermin that he was, took in Lazarus and offered all the help he could to restore him to his former strength. For Mungus, the holy keeper of the ancient religions, saw something special in Lazarus and believed that the amnesiac blue bird would be the key to stopping the suffering of Nimbranumbra. So, in a selfish, exploitative fashion, Mungus sent Lazarus into the depths of an interdimensional rift—a bridge between the asteroid islands of Nimbranumbra and a world void of color known simply as the “Frameworks.” What followed was an epic tale of discovery and deceit, romance and adventure, laughter and tears.

short_description: Embark on a thrilling odyssey with Lazarus amidst Nimbranumbra's asteroid islands. Encounter charismatic characters, explore ancient ruins, quaint villages, and brave the eerie 'Frameworks.' Battle foes, complete quests, and solve puzzles in this captivating hand-drawn fantasy epic!
